duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain medical records and assist in the preparation of surgical suite and surgical patients.
Fill prescriptions accurately and perform laboratory work and diagnostic imaging.
Provide compassionate care for boarded and hospitalized pets, and create a low-stress atmosphere for clients and patients.
Assist in maintaining a home away from home environment for boarded and hospitalized pets.

education_certification.credential: Certified Veterinary Assistant (CVA) certification is preferred.
